expressionInfos.name: expr0
expressionInfos.title: Name of boat present

expressionInfos.name: expr1
expressionInfos.title: Pest present

expressionInfos.name: expr2
expressionInfos.title: Last inspection
expressionInfos.expression:
var lasti = iif($feature.DateOfMostRecentCheck != Null," was last inspected on " + text($feature.DateOfMostRecentCheck,'DD/MM/YYYY')," is yet to be inspected")
return "This " + $feature.PlaceType + lasti

expressionInfos.name: expr3
expressionInfos.title: Hazards
expressionInfos.expression:
var haz = iif($feature.MostRecentHazardBoolean == "Yes"," HAZARD! ","")
return haz + "  " + $feature.MostRecentHazardComment
